full_body.name: Jumping Jacks
full_body.instructions: Start standing with your feet together and arms at your sides. Jump your feet out while raising your arms overhead, then jump back to the starting position.

full_body.name: Sit-ups
full_body.instructions: Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor. Curl your torso up toward your thighs, then lower back down.

full_body.name: Crunches
full_body.instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor. Lift your shoulder blades off the ground, squeezing your abs, then lower back down.

full_body.name: Flutter Kicks
full_body.instructions: Lie on your back with your legs extended. Lift your legs slightly off the ground and alternate kicking them up and down in a controlled motion.

full_body.name: V-ups
full_body.instructions: Lie on your back with arms extended overhead. Simultaneously lift your legs and torso to meet in the middle, then lower back down.

full_body.name: Leg Raises
full_body.instructions: Lie flat on your back with your legs straight. Lift your legs up toward the ceiling, keeping them straight, and then lower them back down without touching the floor.

full_body.name: Bicycle Crunches
full_body.instructions: Lie on your back with your hands behind your head. Alternate bringing each elbow toward the opposite knee in a bicycle pedaling motion.

full_body.name: Russian Twists
full_body.instructions: Sit on the floor with your knees bent and feet off the ground. Twist your torso to the right and left while keeping your core engaged.

full_body.name: Superman
full_body.instructions: Lie face down, extend your arms forward, and lift your arms and legs off the ground simultaneously, holding the position briefly before lowering.

full_body.name: Reverse Crunches
full_body.instructions: Lie on your back with your knees bent. Lift your legs toward your chest, bringing your hips off the ground, then lower back down.

full_body.name: Toe Touches
full_body.instructions: Lie on your back with legs extended toward the ceiling. Reach your arms up to touch your toes, lifting your shoulder blades off the floor.

full_body.name: Warrior II
full_body.instructions: Step one foot back, bend the front knee, and extend your arms parallel to the floor while keeping your torso upright.

full_body.name: Chair Pose
full_body.instructions: Stand with feet together, bend your knees and lower your hips as if sitting in a chair, while extending your arms overhead.

full_body.name: Cobra Pose
full_body.instructions: Lie face down, place your hands under your shoulders, and push your torso upward while keeping your hips on the floor.

full_body.name: Child's Pose
full_body.instructions: Kneel on the floor, sit back on your heels, and stretch your arms forward, lowering your torso towards the ground.

full_body.name: Bridge Pose
full_body.instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor. Lift your hips toward the ceiling while squeezing your glutes.

full_body.name: Cat-Cow Pose
full_body.instructions: Start on all fours. Arch your back up (Cat), then lower your belly down and lift your chest (Cow), moving between the two.

full_body.name: Standing Forward Bend
full_body.instructions: Stand with your feet together, bend at the hips, and reach your hands toward your feet while keeping your legs straight.

full_body.name: Seated Twist
full_body.instructions: Sit on the floor with your legs extended, bend one knee, and twist your torso toward the bent leg while keeping your back straight.

full_body.name: Boat Pose
full_body.instructions: Sit on the floor, lean back slightly, lift your legs off the ground, and hold your arms out in front of you, creating a V-shape with your body.
